alert.note: Alert for Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 11:31AM EST until December 17 at 12:15PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Georgetown County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 1215 PM EST. * At 1131 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yawkey South Island, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Yawkey South Island, Winyah Bay Entrance, and North Santee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
